title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-1.3 - Waivers and additional information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-1.3 - Waivers and additional information

State Regulations

The superintendent may waive the filing of any of the information required herein upon good cause shown and upon such terms as he deems appropriate, and may require the filing of such additional information as he deems necessary to implement the purposes of article 16 of the Insurance Law and this regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
81-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
